channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- DataPower Gateway CD
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- DataPower Gateway CD

item.title: CVE-2018-1664|2024-09-17T03:07:40.633Z -- ibm -- datapower%20gateway%20cd
item.description: IBM DataPower Gateway 7.1.0.0 - 7.1.0.23, 7.2.0.0 - 7.2.0.21, 7.5.0.0 - 7.5.0.16, 7.5.1.0 - 7.5.1.15, 7.5.2.0 - 7.5.2.15, and 7.6.0.0 - 7.6.0.8 as well as IBM DataPower Gateway CD 7.7.0.0 - 7.7.1.2 echoing of AMP management interface authorization headers exposes login credentials in browser cache. IBM X-Force ID: 144890.
